/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a bustling street scene in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a pedestrian's viewpoint on the sidewalk, immersing the viewer in the city's daily life. The street is flanked by modern buildings, their facades adorned with large billboards and advertisements, reflecting the commercial vibrancy of the city. Cars and buses traverse the road, adding to the dynamic energy of the scene. The sky above is a clear blue, providing a stark contrast to the urban landscape below. The image is bathed in the warm glow of a sunny day, casting long shadows and highlighting the architectural details of the buildings.
